content:
### Node naming conventions | Convention | Correct | Incorrect | | ---------- | ------- | --------- | | If a node is a trigger node,
the displayed name should have 'Trigger' at the end,
with a space before. | Shopify Trigger | ShopifyTrigger, Shopify trigger | | Don't include 'node' in the name. | Asana | Asana Node, Asana node |
